name: biotraj
summary: Basic trajectory file format functionality for Biotite; forked from MDTraj

chunks.text:
biotraj
=======

Loading and saving raw data in trajectory formats.

This package is small excerpt from https://github.com/mdtraj/mdtraj containing only the
functionality to read and write trajectory files.
It is not intended to be used as a separate package, but is a dependency for
It is not integrated into the Biotite package directly due to an incompatible license.

Currently supported formats:

- *XTC*
- *TRR*
- *NetCDF*
- *DCD*

usage_description: This library is used to load and save raw data in various trajectory file formats, including XTC, TRR, NetCDF, and DCD. By utilizing this library, developers can easily read from and write to these files, streamlining their workflow when working with molecular dynamics trajectories.
